mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVL(L.like_count, 0) like_count, F.THUMBNAIL thumbnail, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count, F.NO foodNo, C.ID categoryId, C.VALUE food_category, M.PROFILE profile, F.ADDRESS food_address, P.POINT, INSTR(b.CONTENT, 'img') imageCheck FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON (B.MEMBERNO = M.NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) like_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_LIKE_TB GROUP BY BOARDNO) L ON L.BOARDNO = B.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'STATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO INNER JOIN DC_BOARD_FOOD_TB F ON (F.BOARDNO = B.NO) INNER JOIN DC_FOOD_POINT_TB P ON (P.FOODNO = F.NO) INNER JOIN DC_CODE_TB C ON (F.CATEGORY = C.ID) WHERE B.TYPE = 'BOARD002' AND B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
